Package ru.nubowski.timeTracker.service

Class ProcessService

java.lang.Object
ru.nubowski.timeTracker.service.ProcessService
@Service public class ProcessService extends Object
Service for managing processes related to all main services. UserService, TaskService, TimeLogService

  • Method Details

    • deleteTimeLogsAndTasks

      @Transactional public void deleteTimeLogsAndTasks(String username)
      Deletes a user and all tasks associated with that user.
      Parameters:
      username - the name of the user to be deleted
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the specified user is not found

    • deleteOldUsers

      public void deleteOldUsers(LocalDateTime cutoff)
      Deletes all users who were created before a specific date and time. Part of the cleanup service.
      Parameters:
      cutoff - the date and time to use as a cutoff for deletion
